name: Time Survivors: Chapter 0
description:
This is the free Chapter 0 to Time Survivors, a rogue-like bullet hell game where you can play as legendary historical characters like Abe Lincoln, Tesla, Cleopatra, and more, each now wielding unique custom abilities that revolutionize gameplay.


Transform into a flying ninja robot as Oda Nobunaga, create defensive barriers made of cherry trees as Abe Lincoln, or set the battlefield ablaze as Nero - the choice is yours. Each character brings a unique touch to every run, making each playthrough a unique adventure.


Travel through time and fight hordes of memorable enemies as you unravel a mystery. With over 150 different weapons, items, Relics, and buffs to choose from, every run is a unique experience. Fight skeletons in the Medieval Age, Velociraptors and T-Rexes in the Stone Age, and discover plenty of quests and secrets along the way.


But that's not all - Time Survivors: Chapter 0 presents a new meta progression system, allowing you to unlock and upgrade characters, weapons, and stages, even game mode modifiers, using gold and resources collected during your runs. Tailor your progression to your preferred playstyle and strategically allocate resources to create your own game-breaking build.




  • 2 stages full of enemies, secrets, mini bosses and end-stage bosses: The Dark Age and The Stone Age
  • 8 unlockable characters from the entire human history, each with their own unique ability!
  • 32 different weapons and buffs to choose from for a unique experience every run
  • 8 Cursed Relics
  • 41 different enemies
  • 35 Unlockables


  • 9 stages full of enemies, secrets, mini bosses and end-stage boss
  • 20 unlockable epic characters from the entire human history, each with their own unique ability!
  • 50+ different weapons and buffs to choose from for a unique experience every run
  • 20+ Cursed Relics
  • 107 different enemies
  • 80+ Unlockables


  • Play as epic historic characters, each with their unique ability
  • Tree-based meta progression for all elements in the game
  • Casual quick 20 minute play sessions + plenty of quests and secrets to discover
  • A Sandbox mode to test any overpowered build and train against any enemy




And since you've come this far... don't forget to wishlist the full game to stay up-to-date on the latest features and updates!
